message: I'm offering you a great deal on this product, which I'm sure you'll love. It's a one-time opportunity, and I'm only selling it to you for $100. If you buy it, I'll throw in a free gift, but only if you buy it now. Don't miss out on this amazing offer!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount and the free gift. I'll take it!

I'm glad you enjoyed the previous purchase! However, I must inform you that the free gift I mentioned earlier was just a one-time offer, and it's not included with this new product. That being said, I'm confident that this new product will exceed your expectations. It's a high-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for the same price of $100. I'm willing to take on the risk of selling it to you at a loss, but I believe it's worth it for the potential of building a long-term relationship with you.
